frontmatter.title: About
frontmatter.author: James
frontmatter.excerpt: I'm a full-stack developer specialized in building and managing services and software.

markdownRemark.html:
Hello

I'm a full-stack developer specialized in building and managing services and software.

With experience in languages such as JavaScript / Node.js, Python and Java, I have developed and deployed web apps and APIs on AWS resources and hosting services. Using frameworks from React to Vue.js, I have also designed, tested and deployed websites for people in the world.r

Contact : jungsup.yoo@gmail.com

 

Experiences

Chy Square

Full-stack developer • 2018 - Present

 

WOORI Education & Immigration Consulting

Case Processing Assistant • 2019

 

Indeed

INTL General Research Team Member • 2018 - 2019

 

Baeduck Canada Enterprises

Founder • 2017 - 2019

 

Projects

Chy Square

Collaborated in the designing and creation of websites, iOS and Android apps using React for Chy Square and clients.

Unlyst

Wrote Python scripts to track the status of real estate projects in Toronto and save them on AWS RDS. Designed and deployed a website together with Brandon Graham Donnelly.

Averagenie

Designed and developed a website that shows the average of things in the world.

Han Translations

Developed and updated a company's website to support multiple languages. Created and managed the company's other websites such as Han Copywriting.

Hyra - Hire Your Receipt Analyst

Designed and developed an iOS app to allow users to record their expenses and income by taking a photo.

 

Education / Certification

  • (Sep. 2019 - Present) Computer Science and Geography at University of Toronto
  • (Sep. 2014 - Nov. 2017) Economics and Statistical Science at University of Toronto
  • (Aug. 2020) AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
